items.name: Mass Edit Condition
items.rawContent:
{
    "parentId": "AC1ABDCBK050BA4863S9964E3DC378247DAD",
"name": "Mass Edit Condition",
    "windowTitle": "$$E1D22DABK1D36A478ES9C9BEC0273299916B",
    "type": "custom_view",
    "windowSize": {
        "w": 600
    },
    "bindings": [
        { "source": "global.data.dataSource", "to": "numberField", "target": "dataSource" },
        { "source": "global.data.dataSource", "to": "textField", "target": "dataSource" }
    ],
    "sections": [
        {
            "name": "general",
            "noBorder": true,
            "layout": {
                "type": "dynamicGrid",
                "fixedRowHeight": true
            },
            "column": 0,
            "items": [
                {
                    "type": "GSRadioButton",
                    "identifier": "rbNumberField",
                    "attribute": "fieldType",
                    "defaultValue": true,
                    "value": 0,
                    "text": "$$28CEE33968FFD547223897A19718551FC5FC",
                    "toolTip": "$$3E003AE1K5374A4117SBE07E938FEE1C54D3",
                    "enableItems": ["numberField", "numberOperation", "numberValue"],
                    "group": "labels",
                    "frame": [0, 1]
                },
                {
                    "type": "GSComboBox",
                    "identifier": "numberField",
                    "attribute": "field",
                    "allowEmptySelection": false,
                    "dataSource": { "source": [], "filter": "return d.alias.type == 'number'" } ,
                    "defaultValue": 0,
                    "frame": [1, 1]
                },
                {
                    "type": "GSComboBox",
                    "attribute": "operation",
                    "identifier": "numberOperation",
                    "allowEmptySelection": false,
                    "dataSource": GS.CONST.COMPARE_OPERATIONS,
                    "defaultValue": 0,
                    "frame": [2, 1]
                },
                {
                    "type": "GSStepper",
                    "identifier": "numberValue",
                    "attribute": "value",
                    "defaultValue": 0,
                    "minimum": -GS.CONST.MAX_NUMBER_VALUE,
                    "maximum": GS.CONST.MAX_NUMBER_VALUE,
                    "frame": [3, 1]
                },
                {
                    "type": "GSRadioButton",
                    "attribute": "fieldType",
                    "value": 1,
                    "identifier": "rbTextField",
                    "text": "$$C3FE01727AC94746117A85B98A18964B68DF",
                    "enableItems": ["textField", "textOperation", "textValue"],
                    "toolTip": "$$3E003AE1K5374A4117SBE07E938FEE1C54D3",
                    "group": "labels",
                    "frame": [0, 2]
                },
                {
                    "type": "GSComboBox",
                    "identifier": "textField",
                    "attribute": "field",
                    "allowEmptySelection": false,
                    "dataSource": { "source": [], "filter": "return d.alias.type == 'text'" } ,
                    "defaultValue": 0,
                    "frame": [1, 2]
                },
                {
                    "type": "GSComboBox",
                    "identifier": "textOperation",
                    "attribute": "operation",
                    "allowEmptySelection": false,
                    "dataSource": GS.CONST.COMPARE_OPERATIONS,
                    "defaultValue": 0,
                    "frame": [2, 2]
                },
                {
                    "type": "GSTextField",
                    "identifier": "textValue",
                    "attribute": "value",
                    "frame": [3, 2]
                }
            ]
        }
    ]
}
